text: Mini Psycho Clown (born January 30, 1985) is the ring name of a Mexican Luchador enmascarado, or masked professional wrestler currently signed to Lucha Libre AAA Worldwide (AAA) in the Mini-Estrella division. He is a former AAA World Mini-Estrella Champion. Mini Psycho Clown's real name is not a matter of public record, as is often the case with masked wrestlers in Mexico where their private lives are kept a secret from the wrestling fans. ==Championships and accomplishments== *Lucha Libre AAA Worldwide **AAA World Mini-Estrella Championship (1 time) ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Professional wrestlers from Mexico City Category:Masked wrestlers Category:Mexican male professional wrestlers Category:Mini-Estrella wrestlers
title: Mini Psycho Clown
